medical_history.chief_complaint: Persistent nausea and vomiting for the past 12 hours
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 12 hours prior to presentation with multiple episodes of small amounts of bilious emesis. Unable to take anything by mouth today; TPN was administered. No abdominal pain, no recorded fevers today; last bowel movement yesterday.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hypertension, Type 1 diabetes complicated by gastroparesis, autonomic neuropathy, chronic kidney disease status post combined kidney/pancreas transplant, migraine headaches, left-eye blindness, bilateral cataract surgery, anemia, depression, previous surgery for bowel perforation.
medical_history.family_history: Mother healthy; father died from cardiopulmonary arrest secondary to pulmonary embolism; siblings healthy.
